channel.title: ::200mgamble command for [AllStar]

item.title: ::200mgamble command for [AllStar]
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“dylaster5, post:10, topic:540428”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=659284.msg4409169#msg4409169 date=1392964316]

It says he won 400 million but adds 200?

It either adds 200 or removes 200; so you’ll end up with ±200M from 200M. It doesn’t remove the 200 from his inventory originally which as we know is likely to produce a plethora of bugs
[/quote]I see.

OP as stated previously work on good conventions and practice.

Thanks I am new as you can see like I still use allstar source with is pretty nubby but I thought it would be a good start and I think ill share some of my code on my journey ive fixed all the dupes but wont share those because theyre pretty basic. on future projects hopefully they will look a lot nicer. all my code atm is basic beause im a nub but thanks to all the scapers who help. it means a lot.[/quote]
Angel… c’mon… YOU fixed all of the dupes? and cbf to release them as snippets because they’re pretty basic or because YOU didn’t do them all yourself…
I have no problem helping you out… and you know we’re bros and all…but people not giving/stealing/withholding credits when due… is just something I can’t even fathom.

Read full topic

item.title: ::200mgamble command for [AllStar]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("200mgamble")) { if (!playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000)) { sendMessage("You do not have 200m in your inventory."); return; } int dice = misc.random(100); if (dice > 55) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " has just done ::200mgamble and won 400m!!!!"; addItem(995, 200000000); } else { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " has just done ::200mgamble and lost!"; deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 200000000); } }

This is just simplified a bit; if you compare the two codes, you’ll notice you have a few unnecessary parentheses and braces. You should also try using else statements rather than multiple ifs! If there’s only two satiable conditions than else statements will work perfectly; if not, you can use else if statements! They increase efficiency by quite a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: ::200mgamble command for [AllStar]
item.dc:creator: @dylaster5 dylaster5
item.description:
@dylaster5 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:2, topic:540428”][code=java]
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“200mgamble”)) //; Code By Dylaster4/Slayer
{
if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000) == false)) {
sendMessage(
“You do not have 200m in your inventory.”);
}
else if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000) == true))
{

		int dice = (misc.random(100));
		{
			if (dice >= 56 )
			{PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has just done ::200mgamble and won 400m!!!!");
			addItem(995, 200000000);}
		}
		{
			if (dice <= 55 )
			{PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has just done ::200mgamble and lost!");
			deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 200000000);}}

	}

}

[/code]
Fixed up your conventions. :)[/quote]

Thanks man I write really messy code as you can see

Read full topic

@Scape-JAVA wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("200mgamble")) //; Code By Dylaster4/Slayer
	{
		if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000) == false)) {
			sendMessage(
					"You do not have 200m in your inventory.");
		} 
		else if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000) == true)) 
		{

			int dice = (misc.random(100));
			{
				if (dice >= 56 )
				{PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has just done ::200mgamble and won 400m!!!!");
				addItem(995, 200000000);}
			}
			{
				if (dice <= 55 )
				{PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has just done ::200mgamble and lost!");
				deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 200000000);}}

		}

	}

Fixed up your conventions.

item.title: ::200mgamble command for [AllStar]
item.dc:creator: @dylaster5 dylaster5
item.description:
@dylaster5 wrote:

I just thought I would share my autodice 200m command to people who would like to use it it is 45% chance of winning can be easily changed and can easily change the value of the bet by changive the 200000000 into whatever you want
This can also easily be changed to use with a Delta just change the integers

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“200mgamble”)) //; Code By Dylaster4/Slayer
{
if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000) == false)) {
sendMessage(
“You do not have 200m in your inventory.”);
}
else if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000) == true))
{

     int dice = (misc.random(100));

{
if (dice >= 56 )
{PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has just done ::200mgamble and won 400m!!!");
addItem(995, 200000000);}
}
{
if (dice <= 55 )
{PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has just done ::200mgamble and lost!");
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 200000000);}}

}

} [/code]

Read full topic
